timeline.content:
Hello Lilyanne, thank you for contacting Amber Student for your accommodation search in London! As the official partner of UCL, we‚Äôre here to ensure you find the perfect place to stay.

I‚Äôm Shikha, and I‚Äôll be guiding you through the process. Please let me know a convenient time to connect so we can move forward with discussing and exploring your preferred accommodation options.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Thankyou

transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Hi, you've reached Lillian. I can't come to the phone right now, but please leave a message and I'll get back to you as soon as.

Speaker A: Hi, you've reached Lillian. I can't come to the phone right now, but please leave a message and I'll get back to you as soon as I can. Thanks.
Speaker C: At the tone, please record your message. When you've finished recording, you may hang up or press 1 for more options.
Speaker B: Hi, Lily, this is Ayeshika from Amber, and this call is regarding your accommodation. You are searching in London, so let me know your convenient time to connect with you or else you can reach out to me on WhatsApp. Thank you.
